subject: Re: Watch these, what's going on in the world?
author: Adriana Jones
full_text:
I feel bad for the way people treat animals in general.  They're treated like resources instead of sentient beings.  However, since there are still hundreds of thousands if not millions of human slaves throughout the world even today, what can we expect of our treatment of other species?  :(  100% pure cruelty.... peace on earth is a million miles away when people's hearts are still so cruel...
